A Leading Mobile App Development Company

At Codevian, we take pride in being a top mobile app development company in India that understands the challenges businesses face in today’s competitive market. Our team of skilled mobile app developers excels in creating creative and approachable iOS & android mobile applications that meet your particular needs. We collaborate closely with our clients throughout the whole development process to guarantee flawless communication and on-time delivery. Whether you are looking to hire our mobile app developers for team augmentation or are looking for mobile app development services — we have got it all!

4 Unique Things Codevian Offers While Developing Mobile App for You

Framework Development

Our experts have years of experience and can establish a solid foundation for your mobile app, assuring scalability, stability, and efficient performance.

Multilingual apps

We develop multilingual mobile apps that break down language barriers, increasing your worldwide reach and making your app available to a wide range of audiences.

App Prototyping & strategizing

We turn your app concept into a clear, customer-driven, and market-ready solution through comprehensive prototyping and strategic planning.

App Architecture

Our app architecture solution focuses on creating a strong and scalable structure that improves the performance, security, and maintainability of your project.

We Create Apps Based on Technologies

Android
App Development

Our talented team of developers produces innovative Android apps tailored to your company’s demands, delivering the best possible platform performance and user experience.

  • Android Studio
  • Java/Kotlin Programming
  • Get a custom Firebase Integration app
  • Android tv app development
  • Android wear app development
Learn More
iOS App
Development

By utilising the most recent iOS capabilities and technologies, we create seamless and intuitive apps — all due to our developers’ extensive expertise in iOS programming.

  • iPhone app development
  • iPad app development
  • iOS app testing and debugging
  • Apple app development
  • Swift app development
  • Mobile app design for iOS
Learn More
Flutter App
Development

We create high-performance cross-platform apps using Google’s Flutter framework that runs on both iOS and Android devices, offering a cost-effective solution without sacrificing quality.

  • Flutter SDK
  • Dart
  • Hot reload
  • Flutter widgets
  • Material Design
  • Cupertino (iOS-style) widgets
Learn More
React Native
App Development

By combining the strengths of JavaScript and React, our React Native experts build scalable and reliable mobile apps for a variety of platforms, resulting in more rapid development.

  • React Native mobile app development
  • User interface (UI) design
  • React Native components
  • Redux state management
Learn More

Mobile App Development Services

With our skillfully designed mobile application development services, you can unleash the full potential of your company. We blend technology and creative designs to produce robust and user-friendly apps that promote growth and engagement.

Custom Mobile App Development

We specialise in creating custom mobile apps tailored to your business needs & deliver innovative solutions for your mobile app.

Mobile App UI/UX Design

Our mobile app developers can create compelling UI/UX designs for your mobile app to enhance user experiences and captivate your audience.

Mobile App Consulting & Support

In order to guarantee efficient operations and top performance, our knowledgeable team offers mobile app consulting and support services.

Mobile App Integration

Easily integrate various functionalities and systems into your mobile app with our proven expertise in mobile app integration services.

Mobile App Migration and Upgrade

Our skilled mobile app developers help you migrate your app and update your legacy systems without any hassle so you can achieve new business goals.

Mobile App Product Design

With our product designing expertise, you can rely on us to develop a mobile app that will put you ahead of your competitors.

Startup App Development

Empower your startup’s vision with cutting-edge technologies as we craft your dream app — all while adhering to a pocket-friendly budget.

Mobile App Maintenance & Support

We ensure that your app functions smoothly after it is launched, offering updates and quick fixes to provide an uninterrupted user experience.

Back-end Development

Our back-end development offers smooth operation, data management, and strong server-side solutions that boost the performance and scalability of your application.

Enterprise Application Development & Integration

Our mobile app development team can design unique apps & integrate existing services & data to optimize your business processes, increase efficiency and boost customer engagement.

Mobile App Development For All Platforms

We are a mobile app development company that is an expert in leveraging each platform’s distinctive capabilities to produce high-performance, intuitive, and visually appealing mobile applications.

1. Native Mobile App Development

Our developers are prompt in creating native mobile apps that are dedicated to particular operating systems like iOS and Android. These apps guarantee smooth performance, access to device features, and a highly optimised user experience.

2. Hybrid Mobile App Development

We build hybrid mobile apps utilising frameworks such as Ionic and React Native, allowing for efficient cost-effective development with code sharing across platforms, resulting in a quicker time-to-market and wider audience reach.

3. Web Mobile App Development

We have experience creating progressive web apps (PWAs), which allow cross-platform compatibility and offline access for better user convenience while delivering app-like experiences through web browsers.

4. Cross-Platform Mobile App Development

By utilising our expertise with platforms like Flutter and Xamarin, you get cross-platform mobile apps that operate smoothly on a variety of devices — this saves costs and development time while preserving native-like performance and user experience.

Hire Our Mobile App Developers for Efficient Project Delivery

For effective & quick project delivery, you can rely on our mobile app developers to augment your team. Our skilled and experienced developers use the most recent technologies and frameworks, resulting in solutions of the highest calibre. We provide specialised solutions to meet your unique demands with flexible engagement models including part-time, full-time, hourly, or per-project basis. You can count on us to meet your needs for mobile app development with the best possible results.

  • Proficient in the latest frameworks and technologies
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
  • Knowledge of user interface and user-experience design.
  • Cross-platform app development expertise
  • Excellent interpersonal and teamwork skills
  • Agile development methodology
  • Understanding of integrating services and APIs

Next-Gen Features with Mobile App Development

Being a leading mobile app development agency, we specialise in creating both enterprise and consumer mobile applications. To make truly useful and user-friendly apps, we use a wide range of technologies and tools. While some features may be used together, we recognise that each app is different and work to come up with a special value proposition for each project while also customising the functionality to match the demands of the intended audience.

Don't Let Your Competitors Outperform You!

Buckle up and get ahead of your competitors with our innovative mobile app development services. Whether it’s integrating a new feature or full-cycle mobile app development, you are just a step away from reaching your goals.

Start today

Mobile Apps for Different Industries

We design and develop tailored mobile applications for a variety of sectors, In order to meet their unique objectives and provide their target audience with perfect user experiences.
Let's start

Why Choose Us for Your Mobile App Development?

We assemble a highly qualified group of developers with a track record of producing creative and effective mobile applications. You can rest assured that your project is in capable hands with our customer-centric approach and commitment to excellence which results in a successful app development process.

Expert Team

Our mobile app development team is comprised of highly qualified and experienced developers who excel in creating excellent applications.

Innovation at Every Step

We follow the most recent developments in technology to make sure your app has unique features that set it apart from the competition.

User-Centric Approach

In order to create an app that offers an effortless and engaging user experience, we concentrate on understanding your target demographic as well.

Custom Solutions

No two problems are the same and so we provide custom app development services that are created to meet your business needs and objectives.

Transparent Communication

We keep you updated at every stage of the development process to promote efficient communication and faster delivery.

Cost-Effective

Our affordable prices and effective development procedure provide outstanding value for your investments — with us, you increase your ROI.

Ongoing Support

Our team offers ongoing support and maintenance to keep your software updated and optimised even after release.

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT Codevian

Over 1200+ Satisfied Clients and Growing

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey

President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

CEO at BullHead City web

Mobile App Development FAQs

Here are some frequently asked questions (FAQs) about mobile app development. If you don’t find the answer you’re looking for, don’t worry, our friendly executives are always available to assist you.

Contact Us
What is mobile app development?

The process of developing software applications tailored for mobile platforms like Android and iOS is known as mobile app development. Mobile apps must be designed, coded, tested, and deployed in order to offer consumers a range of features and services.

How much does mobile app development cost?

The price of creating a mobile app varies depending on the complexity, functionality, platform (iOS, Android, or cross-platform), and length of the development process. To guarantee cost-effectiveness and a customised solution, our staff quote prices only after learning about your requirements.

Why mobile app development?

Businesses can interact with their audience more effectively using mobile apps, which can increase customer engagement and brand awareness. Mobile apps is a great way to promote business expansion and competitive advantage by creating new revenue sources, improving processes, and providing users with an easy way to access services.

How long does it take to develop a mobile app?

The complexity and features of the app will determine how long it takes to develop. Usually, it can take around a couple of weeks to a few months. Given complete requirements, our team guarantees effective project management to create high-calibre apps in a timely manner.

Do you offer cross-platform app development services?

Yes, we are professionals in cross-platform app development, so your app will work flawlessly on multiple platforms including web browsers, Android and iOS. We help you reach a larger audience while cutting costs and development time.

Can you assist in app store submissions and approvals?

Absolutely! We offer complete support, which includes the major app stores’ app submission and approval procedures. Our team makes sure that your app conforms to rules and regulations, making it easier to deploy.

Do you offer post-launch support and maintenance services?

Yes, we provide thorough post-launch maintenance and assistance to keep your software up-to-date and error-free. In order to guarantee an enjoyable experience for users, our team closely checks the app’s functionality and swiftly fixes any problems.

Can you integrate third-party services into our mobile app?

Yes, we have plenty of experience integrating several third-party APIs, including payment gateways, social media sites, analytics programs, and more.

Will I have access to the app development progress and be involved in the process?

Yes, of course! We keep open lines of communication with our clients all the way through the development process. You will receive access to progress updates, and we encourage input to make sure the app fulfils your expectations.

What measures do you take to ensure the app's security?

Our focus is security. To safeguard your app and its users from potential dangers, we employ industry-standard security procedures, such as data encryption, secure authentication, and vulnerability testing.
